title: OpenOceanTech
author: OpenOceanTech
content: We are looking to hire a graphic animator for some basic educational videos for social media.  These could be whiteboard animation or some other kind of simple tutorial type animations.  We will provide the audio voice-over and written visual scripts.The budget is something like $200 per 4-5 minute video, paid in cryptocurrency.  The topic of this video series is technology, internet privacy, and crypto/blockchain.  So if you have some general knowledge of basic online concepts you'll be fine.  We can also provide very rough sketch storyboard type information.Please reach out to us by email at:OpenOceanTechnology@proton.me

comments.author: sr22398
comments.body: I am interested, I have shared you an email please checkSeth
